15 QStringList PointCloudManipulator::getFilters()
16 {
17  filterList.append("Passthrough");
18  filterList.append("VoxelGrid");
19  filterList.append("Median");
20  filterList.append("Normals");
21  filterList.append("Plane extraction");
22  filterList.append("Bilateral");

28 void PointCloudManipulator::runFilter(int selectedFilter,pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud,pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud, double d1, double d2, double d3, QString xyz)
29 {
30  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
31  switch(selectedFilter)
32  {
33  case 0:
34  // PASSTHROUGH FILTER
35  filterPassThrough(inCloud, outCloud, d1, d2, xyz);
36  lastFiltered = "Passthrough filter, ";
37  lastFiltered.append(" Min: ");
38  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d1));
39  lastFiltered.append(" Max: ");
40  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d2));
41  lastFiltered.append(" Field: ");
42  lastFiltered.append(xyz);
43  break;
44  case 1:
45  // VOXEL GRID FILTER
46  filterVoxelGrid(inCloud, outCloud, d1);
47  lastFiltered = "VoxelGrid filter, ";
48  lastFiltered.append(" Leaf size : ");
49  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d1));
50  break;
51  case 2:
52  // MEDIAN FILTER
53  filterMedian(inCloud, outCloud, d1, d2);
54  lastFiltered = "Median filter, ";
55  lastFiltered.append(" Window size: ");
56  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d1));
57  lastFiltered.append(" Max allowed movement: ");
58  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d2));
59  break;
60  case 3:
61  // NEW VISUALIZER
62  // Send new vis with normals filtered shit
63  filterNormal(inCloud, d1, d2);
64  lastFiltered = "Normals filter, ";
65  lastFiltered.append(" Radius: ");
66  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d1));
67  lastFiltered.append(" Nr. to display: ");
68  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d2));
69  break;
70  case 4:
71  // Plane extraction
72  cloud = extractPlane(inCloud, d1);
73  Q_EMIT sendNewPointCloud(cloud, "filteredCloud");
74  lastFiltered = "Plane extraction, ";
75  lastFiltered.append(" Radius: ");
76  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d1));
77  break;
78  case 5:
79  filterBilateral(inCloud, d1, d2);
80  lastFiltered = "Bilateral filter, ";
81  lastFiltered.append(" SigmaS: ");
82  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d1));
83  lastFiltered.append(" SigmaR: ");
84  lastFiltered.append(QString::number(d2));
85  break;
86  default:
87  ;
88  // SOMETHING WENT WRONG
89  }
90 }

92 void PointCloudManipulator::getNewIndexInfo(int selectedFilter)
93 {
94  QList<QString> labels;
95  labels.append("");
96  labels.append("");
97  labels.append("");
98  QList<bool> show;
99  show.append(false);
100  show.append(false);
101  show.append(false);
102  show.append(false);
103  QList<double> stepsAndRange;
104  stepsAndRange.append(0.1);
105  stepsAndRange.append(0.1);
106  stepsAndRange.append(0.1);
107  stepsAndRange.append(-5);
108  stepsAndRange.append(5);
109  stepsAndRange.append(-5);
110  stepsAndRange.append(5);
111  stepsAndRange.append(-5);
112  stepsAndRange.append(5);
113 
114  switch(selectedFilter)
115  {
116  case 0:
117  // PASSTHROUGH FILTER
118  labels.replace(0, "Minimum:");
119  labels.replace(1, "Maximum:");
120  show.replace(0,true);
121  show.replace(1,true);
122  show.replace(3,true);
123  Q_EMIT sendNewIndexInfo(labels, show, stepsAndRange);
124  break;
125  case 1:
126  // VOXEL GRID FILTER
127  labels.replace(0, "Leaf size:");
128  show.replace(0, true);
129  stepsAndRange.replace(0, 0.001);
130  stepsAndRange.replace(3, 0.001);
131  stepsAndRange.replace(4, 0.2);
132  Q_EMIT sendNewIndexInfo(labels, show, stepsAndRange);
133  break;
134  case 2:
135  // MEDIAN FILTER
136  labels.replace(0, "Window size:");
137  labels.replace(1, "Max movement:");
138  show.replace(0, true);
139  show.replace(1, true);
140  stepsAndRange.replace(0, 1);
141  stepsAndRange.replace(3, 0);
142  stepsAndRange.replace(4, 100);
143  stepsAndRange.replace(5, 0);
144  stepsAndRange.replace(6, 10);
145  Q_EMIT sendNewIndexInfo(labels, show, stepsAndRange);
146  break;
147  case 3:
148  // NORMALS
149  labels.replace(0, "Radius:");
150  labels.replace(1, "Nr. Normals");
151  show.replace(0, true);
152  show.replace(1, true);
153  stepsAndRange.replace(0, 0.001);
154  stepsAndRange.replace(1, 1);
155  stepsAndRange.replace(3, 0.001);
156  stepsAndRange.replace(4, 0.5);
157  stepsAndRange.replace(5, 1);
158  stepsAndRange.replace(6, 10);
159  Q_EMIT sendNewIndexInfo(labels, show, stepsAndRange);
160  break;
161  case 4:
162  // TRANSLATION
163  labels.replace(0, "Radius: ");
164  show.replace(0, true);
165  stepsAndRange.replace(0, 0.01);
166  Q_EMIT sendNewIndexInfo(labels, show, stepsAndRange);
167  break;
168  case 5:
169  labels.replace(0, "Sigma S");
170  labels.replace(1, "Sigma R");
171  show.replace(0, true);
172  show.replace(1,true);
173  stepsAndRange.replace(0, 1);
174  stepsAndRange.replace(1, 0.001);
175  stepsAndRange.replace(3, 0);
176  stepsAndRange.replace(4, 10);
177  stepsAndRange.replace(5, 0);
178  stepsAndRange.replace(6, 0.1);
179 
180  Q_EMIT sendNewIndexInfo(labels, show, stepsAndRange);
181  default:
182  ;
183  // SOMETHING WENT WRONG
184  }
185 }

187 void PointCloudManipulator::filterPassThrough(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud, double limitMin, double limitMax, QString field)
188 {
189  passThroughFilter.setInputCloud(inCloud);
190  passThroughFilter.setFilterFieldName(field.toStdString());
191  passThroughFilter.setFilterLimits(limitMin, limitMax);
192  passThroughFilter.setKeepOrganized(true);
193  passThroughFilter.filter(*outCloud);
194  Q_EMIT sendNewPointCloud(outCloud, "filteredCloud");
195 }

197 void PointCloudManipulator::filterVoxelGrid(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud, double leafSize)
198 {
199  float leaf = leafSize;
200  voxelGridFilter.setInputCloud(inCloud);
201  voxelGridFilter.setLeafSize(leaf, leaf, leaf);
202  voxelGridFilter.filter(*outCloud);
203  Q_EMIT sendNewPointCloud(outCloud, "filteredCloud");

206 void PointCloudManipulator::filterMedian(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud, double windowSize, double maxMovement)
207 {
208  int windowSizeTmp = (int)windowSize;
209  medianFilter.setInputCloud(inCloud);
210  medianFilter.setWindowSize(windowSizeTmp);
211  medianFilter.setMaxAllowedMovement(maxMovement);
212  medianFilter.applyFilter(*outCloud);
213  Q_EMIT sendNewPointCloud(outCloud, "filteredCloud");
214 }

216 void PointCloudManipulator::filterNormal(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, double radius, double nrToDisplay)
217 {
218  int tmpDisplay = (int) nrToDisplay;
219  visualizer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("viewer2", false));
220  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals_out (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
221  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB> ());
222  pcl::NormalEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal> norm_est;
223  norm_est.setSearchMethod(tree);
224  //norm_est.setRadiusSearch (radius);
225  norm_est.setKSearch(10);
226  norm_est.setInputCloud (inCloud);
227  norm_est.compute (*normals_out);
228  visualizer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> (inCloud, "filteredCloud");
229  visualizer->addPointCloudNormals<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal> (inCloud, normals_out, tmpDisplay, 0.05, "normals");
230  visualizer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties(pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_COLOR, 0.0,0.0,1.0, "normals");
231  Q_EMIT sendNewVisualizer(visualizer);
232 }

234 void PointCloudManipulator::filterBilateral(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, double sigmaS, float sigmaR)
235 {
236  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr filteredCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
237  bilateralFilter.setInputCloud(inCloud);
238  bilateralFilter.setSigmaS(sigmaS);
239  bilateralFilter.setSigmaR(sigmaR);

244 void PointCloudManipulator::translateCloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, double rX, double rY, double rZ, double tX, double tY, double tZ)
245 {
246  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr translatedCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
247  Eigen::Matrix4f transform = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
248  double x = M_PI/180*rX;
249  double y = M_PI/180*rY;
250  double z = M_PI/180*rZ;
251  transform << cos(y) * cos(z), -cos(y) * sin(z), sin(y), tX,
252  (cos(x) * sin(z)) + (cos(z) * sin(x) * sin(y)), (cos(x) * cos(z)) - (sin(x) * sin(y) * sin(z)), -cos(y) *
253  sin(x), tY,
254  (sin(x) * sin(z)) - (cos(x) * cos(z) * sin(y)), (cos(z) * sin(x)) + (cos(x) * sin(y) * sin(z)), cos(x) *
255  cos(y), tZ,
256  0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0;
257 
258  pcl::transformPointCloud(*inCloud, *translatedCloud, transform);
259  Q_EMIT sendNewPointCloud(translatedCloud, "translatedCloud");
260 
261 }

275 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::computeSurfaceNormals(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr input, float radius)
276 {
277  pcl::NormalEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal> normal_estimation;
278  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
279  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB> ());
280  normal_estimation.setNumberOfThreads(8);
281  normal_estimation.setSearchMethod (tree);
282  //normal_estimation.setRadiusSearch (radius);
283  normal_estimation.setKSearch(10);
284  normal_estimation.setInputCloud (input);
285  normal_estimation.compute (*normals);
286  return (normals);
287 }

289 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointNormal>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::computeSurfacePointNormals(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr input,
290  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr surface, float radius)
291 {
292  pcl::NormalEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointNormal> normal_estimation;
293  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointNormal>::Ptr normals (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointNormal>);
294  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB> ());
295  normal_estimation.setNumberOfThreads(8);
296  normal_estimation.setSearchSurface(surface);
297  normal_estimation.setSearchMethod (tree);
298  normal_estimation.setRadiusSearch (radius);
299  normal_estimation.setInputCloud (input);
300  normal_estimation.compute (*normals);
301  return (normals);
302 }

304 std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> PointCloudManipulator::extractClusters(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr input, double distance)
305 {
306  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud_f (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>), outcloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
307  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr incloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
308  pcl::copyPointCloud(*input,*incloud);
309 
310  // Create the segmentation object for the planar model and set all the parameters
311  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZRGB> seg;
312  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
313  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
314  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> ());
315  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
316  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
317  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
318  seg.setMaxIterations (100);
319  seg.setDistanceThreshold (distance);
320 
321  int i=0, nr_points = (int) incloud->points.size ();
322 
323 
324  while (incloud->points.size () > 0.3 * nr_points)
325  {
326  // Segment the largest planar component from the remaining cloud
327  seg.setInputCloud (incloud);
328  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
329  if (inliers->indices.size () == 0)
330  {
331  std::cout << "Could not estimate a planar model for the given dataset." << std::endl;
332  break;
333  }
334 
335  // Extract the planar inliers from the input cloud
336  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZRGB> extract;
337  extract.setInputCloud (incloud);
338  extract.setIndices (inliers);
339  extract.setNegative (false);
340 
341  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
342  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
343 
344  // Remove the planar inliers, extract the rest
345  extract.setNegative (true);
346  extract.filter (*cloud_f);
347  *incloud = *cloud_f;
348  }
349 
350  // Creating the KdTree object for the search method of the extraction
351  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
352  tree->setInputCloud (incloud);
353 
354  std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> cluster_indices;
355  pcl::EuclideanClusterExtraction<pcl::PointXYZRGB> ec;
356  ec.setClusterTolerance (0.02); // 2cm = 0.02
357  ec.setMinClusterSize (200);
358  ec.setMaxClusterSize (25000);
359  ec.setSearchMethod (tree);
360  ec.setInputCloud (incloud);
361  ec.extract (cluster_indices);
362 
363  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> clusters;
364  for(int i = 0; i< cluster_indices.size(); i++){
365  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpcloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
366  pcl::copyPointCloud(*incloud,cluster_indices[i],*tmpcloud);
367  clusters.push_back(tmpcloud);
368  }
369 
370  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr clusterCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
371  for(int i = 0; i< clusters.size(); i++){
372  *clusterCloud += *clusters.at(i);
373  }
374 
375  Q_EMIT sendNewPointCloud(clusterCloud, "filteredCloud");
376 
377  return (clusters);
378 }
379 
380 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::detectSIFTKeyPoints(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr points, float minScale,
381  int nrOctaves, int nrScalesPerOctave, float minContrast)
382 {
383  pcl::SIFTKeypoint<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointWithScale> siftDetect;
384  siftDetect.setSearchMethod(pcl::search::Search<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>));
385  siftDetect.setScales(minScale,nrOctaves,nrScalesPerOctave);
386  siftDetect.setMinimumContrast(minContrast);
387  siftDetect.setInputCloud(points);
388  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointWithScale> tmpKeyPoints;
389  siftDetect.compute(tmpKeyPoints);
390  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr keyPoints (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
391  pcl::copyPointCloud(tmpKeyPoints, *keyPoints);
392  return keyPoints;

481 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::filterOutlier(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud)
482 {
483  pcl::StatisticalOutlierRemoval<pcl::PointXYZRGB> sor;
484  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
485  sor.setInputCloud (inCloud);

503 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::computeLocalDescriptorsFPFH(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr points, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals ,
504  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr keyPoints, float featureRadius)
505 {
506  pcl::FPFHEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal, pcl::FPFHSignature33> fpfhEstimation;
507  fpfhEstimation.setNumberOfThreads(8);
508  fpfhEstimation.setSearchMethod(pcl::search::Search<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>));
509  fpfhEstimation.setRadiusSearch(featureRadius);
510  fpfhEstimation.setSearchSurface(points);
511  fpfhEstimation.setInputNormals(normals);
512  fpfhEstimation.setInputCloud(keyPoints);
513  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr localDescriptors (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>);
514  fpfhEstimation.compute(*localDescriptors);
515  return localDescriptors;
516 }

518 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::SHOT1344>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::computeLocalDescriptorsSHOTColor(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr points, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals ,
519  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr keyPoints,float featureRadius)
520 {
521  pcl::SHOTColorEstimationOMP<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::Normal, pcl::SHOT1344> shot;
522  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::SHOT1344>::Ptr localDescriptors (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::SHOT1344>);
523  shot.setNumberOfThreads(8);
524  shot.setInputCloud(keyPoints);
525  shot.setSearchSurface(points);
526  shot.setInputNormals(normals);
527  shot.setRadiusSearch(featureRadius);
528  shot.compute(*localDescriptors);
529  return (localDescriptors);
530 }
531 
532 Eigen::Matrix4f PointCloudManipulator::computeInitialAlignmentFPFH(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr sourcePoints, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr sourceDescriptors,
533  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr targetPoints, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr targetDescriptors,
534  float minSampleDistance, float maxCorrespondenceDistance, int nrIterations)
535 {
536  pcl::SampleConsensusInitialAlignment<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::FPFHSignature33> sacInitAlign;
537  sacInitAlign.setMinSampleDistance(minSampleDistance);
538  sacInitAlign.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(maxCorrespondenceDistance);
539  sacInitAlign.setMaximumIterations(nrIterations);
540 
541  sacInitAlign.setInputSource(sourcePoints);
542  sacInitAlign.setSourceFeatures(sourceDescriptors);
543  sacInitAlign.setInputTarget(targetPoints);
544  sacInitAlign.setTargetFeatures(targetDescriptors);
545 
546  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> regOutput;
547  sacInitAlign.align(regOutput);
548 
549  return (sacInitAlign.getFinalTransformation());
550 }

553  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr targetPoints, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::SHOT1344>::Ptr targetDescriptors,
554  float minSampleDistance, float maxCorrespondenceDistance, int nrIterations)

564  sacInitAlign.setTargetFeatures(targetDescriptors);

571 
572 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::extractPlane(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, double radius)
573 {
574  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
575  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud_no_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
576  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
577  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
578  // Create the segmentation object
579  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZRGB> seg;
580  // Optional
581  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
582  // Mandatory
583  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
584  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
585  seg.setMaxIterations(100);
586  seg.setDistanceThreshold (radius);
587  seg.setInputCloud (inCloud);
588  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
589 
590  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZRGB> extract;
591  extract.setInputCloud (inCloud);
592  extract.setIndices (inliers);
593  extract.setNegative (false);
594 
595  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
596  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
597 
598  // NEW SHIT
599  extract.setNegative(true);
600  extract.filter(*cloud_no_plane);
601 
602  return (cloud_no_plane);
603 }
604 
605 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::extractPlaneReturnPlane(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, double radius)
606 {
607  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
608  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud_no_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
609  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
610  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
611  // Create the segmentation object
612  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZRGB> seg;
613  // Optional
614  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
615  // Mandatory
616  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
617  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
618  seg.setMaxIterations(100);
619  seg.setDistanceThreshold (radius);
620  seg.setInputCloud (inCloud);
621  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
622 
623  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZRGB> extract;
624  extract.setInputCloud (inCloud);
625  extract.setIndices (inliers);
626  extract.setNegative (false);
627 
628  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
629  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
630 
631  return (cloud_plane);
632 }
633 
634 PointCloudManipulator::PointCloudFeatures PointCloudManipulator::computeFeatures(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inCloud, QString keyPoints, QString descriptors)
635 {
636  PointCloudFeatures features;
637  features.points = inCloud;
638 
639  // Normals
640  features.normals = computeSurfaceNormals(features.points, 0.005);
641  std::cout << "Found normals: " ;
642  std::cout << features.normals->size() << std::endl;
643 
644  // Keypoints
645  if(QString::compare(keyPoints, "SIFT", Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0){
646  // CONTRAST IS THE LAST PART (0.01, 3, 3, 0.2)
647  features.keyPoints = detectSIFTKeyPoints(features.points, 0.01, 15, 15, 0.0);
648  std::cout << "Found SIFT keypoints: " ;
649  std::cout << features.keyPoints->size() << std::endl;
650  }
651  else if(QString::compare(keyPoints, "VOXEL", Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0){
652  features.keyPoints = filterVoxel(features.points, 0.001);
653  std::cout << "Found VOXEL keypoints: " ;
654  std::cout << features.keyPoints->size() << std::endl;
655  }
656 
657  // Descriptors
658  if(QString::compare(descriptors, "FPFH", Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0){
659  features.localDescriptorsFPFH = computeLocalDescriptorsFPFH(features.points, features.normals, features.keyPoints, 0.55); //0.15
660  std::cout << "Found FPFH descriptors: " ;
661  std::cout << features.localDescriptorsFPFH->size() << std::endl;
662  }
663  else if(QString::compare(descriptors, "SHOTCOLOR", Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0){
664  features.localDescriptorsSHOTColor = computeLocalDescriptorsSHOTColor(features.points, features.normals,features.keyPoints,0.55);
665  std::cout << "Found SHOTColor descriptors: " ;
666  std::cout << features.localDescriptorsSHOTColor->size() << std::endl;
667  }
668 
669 
670 
671 
672  return features;
673 }
674 
675 void PointCloudManipulator::findFeatureCorrespondences(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr sourceDescriptors, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr targetDescriptors,
676  std::vector<int> &correspondencesOut, std::vector<float> &correspondenceScoresOut)
677 {
678  correspondencesOut.resize(sourceDescriptors->size());
679  correspondenceScoresOut.resize(sourceDescriptors->size());
680 
681  pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::FPFHSignature33> descriptorKDTree;
682  descriptorKDTree.setInputCloud(targetDescriptors);
683 
684  const int k = 1;
685  std::vector<int> k_indices (k);
686  std::vector<float> k_squared_distances (k);
687  for (size_t i = 0; i < sourceDescriptors->size(); i++){
688  descriptorKDTree.nearestKSearch(*sourceDescriptors, i, k , k_indices, k_squared_distances);
689  correspondencesOut[i] = k_indices[0];
690  correspondenceScoresOut[i] = k_squared_distances[0];
691  }
692 }
693 
694 void PointCloudManipulator::visualizeCorrespondences(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr points1, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr keyPoints1,
695  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr points2, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr keyPoints2,
696  std::vector<int> &correspondences, std::vector<float> &correspondenceScores, int maxToDisplay)
697 {
698  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr points_left (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
699  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr keypoints_left (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
700  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr points_right (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
701  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr keypoints_right (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
702  // Shift the first clouds' points to the left
703  //const Eigen::Vector3f translate (0.0, 0.0, 0.3);
704  const Eigen::Vector3f translate (0.4, 0.0, 0.0);
705  const Eigen::Quaternionf no_rotation (0, 0, 0, 0);
706  pcl::transformPointCloud (*points1, *points_left, -translate, no_rotation);
707  pcl::transformPointCloud (*keyPoints1, *keypoints_left, -translate, no_rotation);
708  // Shift the second clouds' points to the right
709  pcl::transformPointCloud (*points2, *points_right, translate, no_rotation);
710  pcl::transformPointCloud (*keyPoints2, *keypoints_right, translate, no_rotation);
711 
712  // Add the clouds to the visualizer
713  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer vis;
714  vis.addPointCloud (points_left, "points_left");
715  vis.addPointCloud (points_right, "points_right");
716 
717  // Compute the weakest correspondence score to display
718  std::vector<float> temp (correspondenceScores);
719  std::sort (temp.begin (), temp.end ());
720  if (maxToDisplay >= temp.size ())
721  maxToDisplay = temp.size () - 1;
722  float threshold = temp[maxToDisplay];
723  // Draw lines between the best corresponding points
724  for (size_t i = 0; i < keypoints_left->size (); ++i)
725  {
726  if (correspondenceScores[i] > threshold)
727  {
728  continue; // Don't draw weak correspondences
729  }
730  // Get the pair of points
731  const pcl::PointXYZRGB & p_left = keypoints_left->points[i];
732  const pcl::PointXYZRGB & p_right = keypoints_right->points[correspondences[i]];
733  // Generate a random (bright) color
734  double r = (rand() % 100);
735  double g = (rand() % 100);
736  double b = (rand() % 100);
737  double max_channel = std::max (r, std::max (g, b));
738  r /= max_channel;
739  g /= max_channel;
740  b /= max_channel;
741  // Generate a unique string for each line
742  std::stringstream ss ("line");
743  ss << i;
744  // Draw the line
745  vis.addLine (p_left, p_right, r, g, b, ss.str ());
746  }
747  vis.resetCamera ();
748  vis.spin ();
749 }
750 
751 pcl::CorrespondencesPtr PointCloudManipulator::findCorrespondences(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr sourceDescriptors, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr targetDescriptors)
752 {
753  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr correspondences (new pcl::Correspondences);
754  pcl::registration::CorrespondenceEstimation<pcl::FPFHSignature33, pcl::FPFHSignature33> est;
755  est.setInputSource(sourceDescriptors);
756  est.setInputTarget(targetDescriptors);
757  est.determineCorrespondences(*correspondences);
758  return correspondences;
759 }

770 pcl::CorrespondencesPtr PointCloudManipulator::rejectCorrespondencesDistance(pcl::CorrespondencesPtr correspondences, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr sourceKeyPoints,
771  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr targetKeyPoints, float maximumDistance)
772 {
773  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr goodCorrespondences (new pcl::Correspondences);
774  pcl::registration::CorrespondenceRejectorDistance rej;
775  rej.setInputSource<pcl::PointXYZRGB> (sourceKeyPoints);
776  rej.setInputTarget<pcl::PointXYZRGB> (targetKeyPoints);
777  rej.setMaximumDistance(maximumDistance); //meters
778  rej.setInputCorrespondences(correspondences);
779  rej.getCorrespondences(*goodCorrespondences);
780  return goodCorrespondences;
781 }

783 pcl::CorrespondencesPtr PointCloudManipulator::rejectCorrespondencesSampleConsensus(pcl::CorrespondencesPtr correspondences,

819 void PointCloudManipulator::visualizeCorrespondences(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr sourcePoints, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr targetPoints,
820  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr sourceKeyPoints, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr targetKeyPoints,
821  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr correspondences, pcl::CorrespondencesPtr goodCorrespondences)
822 {
823  const Eigen::Vector3f translate (0.4, 0.0, 0.0);
824  const Eigen::Quaternionf no_rotation (0, 0, 0, 0);
825  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr left (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
826  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr leftKey (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
827  pcl::transformPointCloud (*sourcePoints, *left, -translate, no_rotation);
828  pcl::transformPointCloud (*sourceKeyPoints, *leftKey, -translate, no_rotation);
829 
830  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer vis;
831  int c = 0;
832  int d = 1;
833  vis.createViewPort(0, 0, 0.5, 1, c);
834  vis.createViewPort(0.5, 0, 1, 1, d);
835  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> red (left, 255, 0, 0);
836  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> blue (targetPoints, 0, 0, 255);
837  vis.addPointCloud(left, red, "cloud1",c);
838  vis.addPointCloud(targetPoints, blue, "cloud2",c);
839  vis.addCorrespondences<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(leftKey,targetKeyPoints,*correspondences,"Correspondences",c);
840  vis.addPointCloud(left, red, "cloud1b",d);
841  vis.addPointCloud(targetPoints, blue, "cloud2b", d);
842  vis.addCorrespondences<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(leftKey,targetKeyPoints,*goodCorrespondences, "Good correspondences",d);
843  vis.spin();
844 
845 }

847 Eigen::Matrix4f PointCloudManipulator::estimateTransformationSVD(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr sourcePoints, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr targetPoints, pcl::CorrespondencesPtr correspondences)
848 {
849  Eigen::Matrix4f transResult = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity ();
850  pcl::registration::TransformationEstimationSVD<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB> estTransSVD;
851  estTransSVD.estimateRigidTransformation(*sourcePoints, *targetPoints, *correspondences, transResult);
852  return transResult;
853 }

863 void PointCloudManipulator::visualizeTransformation(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr sourcePoints, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr targetPoints,
864  Eigen::Matrix4f transform)
865 {
866  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer vis;
867  int a = 0;
868  int b = 1;
869  vis.createViewPort(0, 0, 0.5, 1, a);
870  vis.createViewPort(0.5, 0, 1, 1, b);
871 
872  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> red (sourcePoints, 255, 0, 0);
873  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> blue (targetPoints, 0, 0, 255);
874  vis.addPointCloud(sourcePoints, red, "source",a);
875  vis.addPointCloud(targetPoints, blue, "target",a);
876 
877  vis.addPointCloud(sourcePoints, red, "source2",b);
878  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmp2 (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
879  pcl::transformPointCloud(*targetPoints, *tmp2, transform);
880  vis.addPointCloud(tmp2, blue, "target2", b);
881  vis.spin();
882 }
883 
884 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::sampleSTL(QString path, int resolution, int tess_level)
885 {
886  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
887 
888  pcl::PolygonMesh mesh;
889  pcl::io::loadPolygonFileSTL(path.toStdString(), mesh);
890 
891  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> scaled_mesh;
892  Eigen::Matrix4f scaleMatrix = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
893  scaleMatrix(0,0)=0.001f;
894  scaleMatrix(1,1)=0.001f;
895  scaleMatrix(2,2)=0.001f;
896 
897  pcl::fromPCLPointCloud2(mesh.cloud,scaled_mesh);
898  pcl::transformPointCloud(scaled_mesh,scaled_mesh,scaleMatrix);
899  pcl::toPCLPointCloud2(scaled_mesh, mesh.cloud);
900 
901  // Create mesh object
902  vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> meshVTK;
903  pcl::VTKUtils::convertToVTK(mesh, meshVTK);
904 
905  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer generator("Generating traces...");
906  generator.addModelFromPolyData (meshVTK, "mesh", 0);
907  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>, Eigen::aligned_allocator<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> > > clouds;
908  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > poses;
909  std::vector<float> enthropies;
910 
911  // Generate traces
912  generator.renderViewTesselatedSphere(resolution, resolution, clouds, poses, enthropies, tess_level);
913 
914  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tmp(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
915  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmprgb(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
916  for(int i=0; i<clouds.size(); i++){
917  Eigen::Matrix4f tmpPose;
918  tmpPose = poses.at(i).inverse();
919  pcl::transformPointCloud(clouds.at(i), *tmp, tmpPose);
920  pcl::copyPointCloud(*tmp, *tmprgb);
921  *outCloud += *tmprgb;
922  }
923 
924  for (int i = 0; i< outCloud->points.size(); i++){
925  outCloud->points[i].r = 255;
926  outCloud->points[i].g = 255;
927  outCloud->points[i].b = 255;
928  }
929 
930  return outCloud;
931 
932 }
933 
934 void PointCloudManipulator::matchModelCloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr model, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr scene)
935 {
936  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr fullScene(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
937  *fullScene = *scene;
938 
939 
940 
941 
942 
943 
944  //Camera to tag
945  Eigen::Matrix4f cameraToTag = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
946 // cameraToTag << 0.0139678, 0.998862, 0.0456047, -0.299209,
947 // 0.707306, 0.0223681, -0.706554, -0.578648,
948 // -0.70677, 0.0421254, -0.706188, 1.80034,
949 // 0 , 0, 0, 1;
950  cameraToTag << -0.0324064, 0.999472, 0.00236665, -0.236723,
951  0.701194, 0.0244224, -0.712552, -0.589319,
952  -0.712233, -0.0214317, -0.701615, 1.82195,
953  0, 0, 0, 1;
954  Eigen::Matrix4f worldToTag = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
955  worldToTag << 1, 0, 0, -0.084,
956  0, 1, 0, -0.292,
957  0, 0, 1, 0.87,
958  0, 0, 0, 1;
959 
960  scene = filterPassThrough(scene, -0.4, 0.4, "x");
961  scene = filterPassThrough(scene, -0.6, -0.04, "y");
962  scene = filterPassThrough(scene, 1.1, 1.8, "z");
963 
964 
965  model = filterVoxel(model, 0.005);
966  scene = filterVoxel(scene, 0.001);
967  scene = extractPlane(scene,0.02);
968 
969 
970  PointCloudFeatures modelFeature = computeFeatures(model, "SIFT", "SHOTCOLOR");
971  PointCloudFeatures sceneFeature = computeFeatures(scene, "SIFT", "SHOTCOLOR");
972 
973 
974  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer rapportvis;
975  rapportvis.addPointCloud(scene, "scene");
976  rapportvis.spin();
977 
978 
979  // CORRESPONDENCE USING CORRESPONDENCEESTIMATION
980  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr all_correspondences (new pcl::Correspondences);
981  //all_correspondences = findCorrespondences(modelFeature.localDescriptorsFPFH, sceneFeature.localDescriptorsFPFH);
982  all_correspondences = findCorrespondencesSHOT(modelFeature.localDescriptorsSHOTColor, sceneFeature.localDescriptorsSHOTColor);
983  std::cout << "CorrespondenceEstimation correspondences ALL: ";
984  std::cout << all_correspondences->size() << std::endl;
985 
986  // CORRESPONDENCE REJECTION USING SAMPLE CONSENSUS
987  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr corrRejectSampleConsensus (new pcl::Correspondences);
988  corrRejectSampleConsensus = rejectCorrespondencesSampleConsensus(all_correspondences,modelFeature.keyPoints,sceneFeature.keyPoints,0.03,1000); //Was 0.10, 0.07, 0.05
989  std::cout << "Rejected using sample consensus, new amount is : ";
990  std::cout << corrRejectSampleConsensus->size() << std::endl;
991 
992  //visualizeCorrespondences(modelFeature.keyPoints, sceneFeature.keyPoints, modelFeature.keyPoints, sceneFeature.keyPoints, all_correspondences, corrRejectSampleConsensus);
993  visualizeCorrespondences(modelFeature.points, fullScene, modelFeature.keyPoints, sceneFeature.keyPoints, all_correspondences, corrRejectSampleConsensus);
994 
995  Eigen::Matrix4f transSVD = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity ();
996  transSVD = estimateTransformationSVD(modelFeature.keyPoints, sceneFeature.keyPoints, corrRejectSampleConsensus);
997  std::cout << "Initial transformation CAMERA to OBJECT: " << std::endl;
998  std::cout << transSVD << std::endl;
999  visualizeTransformation(sceneFeature.points, modelFeature.points, transSVD);
1000  //visualizeTransformation(fullScene, modelFeature.points, transSVD);
1001 
1002 // Eigen::Matrix4f transLM = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity ();
1003 // transLM = estimateTransformationLM(modelFeature.keyPoints, sceneFeature.keyPoints, corrRejectSampleConsensus);
1004 // std::cout << "Initial transformation: " << std::endl;
1005 // std::cout << transLM << std::endl;
1006 // visualizeTransformation(sceneFeature.points, modelFeature.points, transLM);
1007 
1008 
1009 
1010  Eigen::Affine3f A;
1011 
1012  std::cout << "VISUALIZE ESTIMATION TRANSFORMATION" << std::endl;
1013  A = transSVD;
1014  Eigen::Affine3f B2;
1015  B2 = cameraToTag;
1016  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer vis;
1017  //vis.addCoordinateSystem(0.2);
1018  //vis.addCoordinateSystem(0.4, A);
1019  //vis.addCoordinateSystem(0.8, B2);
1020  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> red (modelFeature.points, 255, 0, 0);
1021  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> blue (fullScene, 0, 0, 255);
1022  //vis.addPointCloud(fullScene,blue, "fullScene");
1023  vis.addPointCloud(fullScene, "fullScene");
1024  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr model2 (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1025  pcl::transformPointCloud(*modelFeature.points,*model2,transSVD);
1026  vis.addPointCloud(modelFeature.points,red, "model");
1027  vis.addPointCloud(model2,red,"model2");
1028  vis.spin();
1029 
1030  // ICP
1031  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB> icp;
1032  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(0.01);
1033  icp.setMaximumIterations(1000);
1034  icp.setTransformationEpsilon(1e-8 );
1035  icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(0.00001);
1036  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmp (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1037  Eigen::Matrix4f aids = transSVD;
1038  pcl::transformPointCloud(*modelFeature.points,*tmp,aids);
1039  icp.setInputSource(tmp);
1040  icp.setInputTarget(sceneFeature.points);
1041  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1042  icp.align(*outCloud);
1043 
1044  Eigen::Matrix4f final;
1045  if(icp.hasConverged()){
1046  std::cout << "Converged! \n";
1047 
1048  final = icp.getFinalTransformation();
1049 
1050  //std::cout << icp.getFinalTransformation() << std::endl;
1051  }
1052  final = final*transSVD;
1053 
1054  std::cout << "FINAL transformation CAMERA to OBJECT: " << std::endl;
1055  std::cout << final << std::endl;
1056 
1057  std::cout << "CAMERA TO TAG MATRIX: " << std::endl;
1058  std::cout << cameraToTag << std::endl;
1059 
1060  Eigen::Matrix4f initialTable = cameraToTag.inverse()*transSVD;
1061  std::cout << "Initial table transform: " << std::endl;
1062  std::cout << initialTable << std::endl;
1063  Eigen::Matrix4f finalTable = cameraToTag.inverse()*final;
1064  std::cout << "Final table transform: " << std::endl;
1065  std::cout << finalTable << std::endl;
1066 
1067 
1068  vis.addPointCloud(tmp, "modelMoved");
1069  vis.addPointCloud(outCloud, "modelRefined");
1070 
1071  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr heihoo (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1072  pcl::transformPointCloud(*modelFeature.points,*heihoo,final);
1073  vis.addPointCloud(heihoo, "WHAT");
1074 
1075 
1076  Eigen::Matrix4f test = cameraToTag*worldToTag.inverse();
1077  Eigen::Affine3f C;
1078  C = test;
1079  vis.addCoordinateSystem(0.5, C);
1080  vis.spin();
1081 
1082  std::cout << "World coordinates" << std::endl;
1083  Eigen::Matrix4f posInWorld = worldToTag*finalTable;
1084  std::cout << posInWorld << std::endl;
1085 
1086 
1087 
1088  Eigen::Affine3f A2;
1089  float x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw;
1090  A2 = posInWorld;
1091  pcl::getTranslationAndEulerAngles(A2, x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw);
1092  std::cout << "X: " << x << ", Y: " << y << ", Z: " << z << std::endl;
1093  std::cout << "Roll: " << roll*(180.0/3.14) << ", Pitch: " << pitch*(180.0/3.14) << ", yaw: " << yaw*(180.0/3.14) << std::endl;
1094 
1095 
1096 
1097  Eigen::Affine3f finalCoordinates;
1098  finalCoordinates = final;
1099  visualizer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("viewer2", false));
1100  visualizer->addCoordinateSystem(0.2, B2);
1101  visualizer->addCoordinateSystem(0.2, finalCoordinates);
1102  visualizer->addCoordinateSystem(0.2, C);
1103  visualizer->addPointCloud(fullScene, "fullScene");
1104  visualizer->addPointCloud(heihoo, "model");
1105 
1106  Q_EMIT sendNewVisualizer(visualizer);
1107 
1108 
1109  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer tmpVis;
1110  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> red2 (heihoo, 255, 0, 0);
1111  tmpVis.addPointCloud(heihoo,red2, "model");
1112  tmpVis.addPointCloud(fullScene, "fullScene");
1113  tmpVis.spin();
1114 
1115 
1116 }

1139 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr PointCloudManipulator::alignCloudsRefined(std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> cloudsIn)
1140 {
1141  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> clouds;
1142  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> cloudsOriginal;
1143 
1144  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f> cameraPositions;
1145  Eigen::Matrix4f cam0 = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1146  cameraPositions.push_back(cam0);
1147  Eigen::Matrix4f cam1 = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1148  // This is the matrix from NUC2 to table
1149  cam1 << -0.0369295, -0.99916 , 0.0177825, 0.174928,
1150  -0.592998, 0.00758757 , -0.805168 , 0.016518,
1151  0.804357, -0.0402794 , -0.59278 , 0.945164,
1152  0, 0 , 0 , 1;
1153  cameraPositions.push_back(cam1);
1154  Eigen::Matrix4f cam2 = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1155  // This is the matrix from PC to table
1156  cam2 << -0.999718 , -0.0224201 ,-0.00776418 , 0.604796,
1157  -0.00404688 , 0.483571 , -0.875296 , -0.256756,
1158  0.0233787 , -0.875018 , -0.483525 , 2.14104,
1159  0 , 0 , 0 , 1;
1160  cameraPositions.push_back(cam2);
1161  // This is the matrix from NUC1 to table
1162  Eigen::Matrix4f cam3 = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1163  cam3 << -0.0324064, 0.999472, 0.00236665, -0.236723,
1164  0.701194, 0.0244224, -0.712552, -0.589319,
1165  -0.712233, -0.0214317, -0.701615, 1.82195,
1166  0, 0, 0, 1;
1167 
1168  cameraPositions.push_back(cam3);
1169 
1170 
1171  for(int i = 0; i<cloudsIn.size()-1; i++){
1172  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1173  std::cout << "Loop nr: " << i << std::endl;
1174  *tmpCloud = *cloudsIn.at(i);
1175 
1176 
1177  cloudsOriginal.push_back(tmpCloud);
1178  tmpCloud = filterVoxel(tmpCloud, 0.01);
1179 
1180  // ROBOT CELL
1181  switch(i){
1182  case 0:
1183  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.4, 0.39, "x");
1184  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -1.1, -0.1, "y");
1185  //tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.6, 3.5, "z");
1186  break;
1187  case 1:
1188  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.5, 0.3, "x");
1189  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.7, 0.3, "y");
1190  //tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 0.7, 4.7, "z");
1191  break;
1192  case 2:
1193  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.5, 0.39, "x");
1194  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.4, 0.1, "y");
1195  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 0.8, 3.1, "z");
1196  break;
1197  }
1198 
1199  tmpCloud = filterVoxel(tmpCloud, 0.001);
1200  tmpCloud = extractPlane(tmpCloud,0.02);
1201 
1202  clouds.push_back(tmpCloud);
1203  }
1204 
1205  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> roughClouds;
1206  roughClouds.push_back(clouds.at(0));
1207  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f> cameraPositions2;
1208  Eigen::Matrix4f tmp = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1209  cameraPositions2.push_back(tmp);
1210  for(int i=1; i<clouds.size(); i++){
1211  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmp (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1212  Eigen::Matrix4f tmpMat2 = cameraPositions.at(i);
1213  Eigen::Matrix4f tmpMat3 = cameraPositions.at(3);
1214  Eigen::Matrix4f final = tmpMat3*tmpMat2.inverse();
1215  cameraPositions2.push_back(final);
1216  pcl::transformPointCloud(*clouds.at(i),*tmp,final);
1217  roughClouds.push_back(tmp);
1218  }
1219 
1220 
1221  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB> icp;
1222  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(0.03); // 0.05
1223  icp.setMaximumIterations(1000);
1224  icp.setTransformationEpsilon(1e-10);
1225  icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(0.0000001);
1226  icp.setInputTarget(roughClouds.at(0));
1227 
1228  for(int i=1; i<roughClouds.size(); i++){
1229  icp.setInputSource(roughClouds.at(i));
1230  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1231  icp.align(*outCloud);
1232  Eigen::Matrix4f transICP = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1233  if(icp.hasConverged()){
1234  std::cout << "Converged! ";
1235  std::cout << i << std::endl;
1236  transICP = icp.getFinalTransformation();
1237  cameraPositions2[i] = transICP*cameraPositions2[i];
1238 
1239  }
1240  }
1241 
1242  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr writeToFileCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1243  for(int i=0; i<roughClouds.size(); i++){
1244  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmp (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1245  pcl::transformPointCloud(*cloudsOriginal[i], *tmp, cameraPositions2[i]);
1246  *writeToFileCloud += *tmp;
1247  }
1248 
1249  pcl::io::savePCDFileBinary("/home/minions/alignedWithObject.pcd", *writeToFileCloud);
1250 
1251 
1252 // pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr test (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1253 // for(int i=0; i<roughClouds.size(); i++){
1254 // *test += *roughClouds.at(i);
1255 // }
1256 // return test;
1257 
1258  return (writeToFileCloud);
1259 }

1356  transLM = estimateTransformationLM(features1.keyPoints, features2.keyPoints, corrRejectSampleConsensus);

1359 
1360  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB> icp;
1361  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(0.001);
1362  icp.setMaximumIterations(100);
1363  icp.setTransformationEpsilon(1e-8);
1364  icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(0.0001);
1365  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmp1 (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1366  pcl::transformPointCloud(*features1.points,*tmp1,transSVD);
1367  icp.setInputSource(tmp1);
1368  icp.setInputTarget(features2.points);
1369  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1370 
1371 
1372  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer vis;
1373  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> red (tmp1, 255, 0, 0);
1374  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZRGB> blue (outCloud, 0, 0, 255);
1375  vis.addPointCloud(tmp1, red, "tmp1");
1376  vis.addPointCloud(outCloud, blue, "bluu");
1377  icp.align(*outCloud);
1378 
1379  while(!icp.hasConverged()){
1380  vis.updatePointCloud(tmp1, red, "tmp1");
1381  vis.updatePointCloud(outCloud, blue, "bluu");
1382  vis.spinOnce();
1383  }
1384 
1385  vis.updatePointCloud(tmp1, red, "tmp1");
1386  vis.updatePointCloud(outCloud, blue, "bluu");
1387  vis.spin();
1388 
1389 
1390 
1391 
1392 }

1394 void PointCloudManipulator::alignClouds(QStringList fileNames)
1395 {
1396  std::vector<PointCloudFeatures> pointClouds;
1397 
1398  for(int i = 0; i<fileNames.size(); i++){
1399  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1400  std::cout << fileNames.at(i).toStdString() << std::endl;
1401  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(fileNames.at(i).toUtf8().constData(), *tmpCloud);
1402  // BIG CLOUDS
1403 // tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 0.0, 6.5, "z");
1404 // tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -1.0, 2.7, "y");
1405  // TABLE
1406  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 0.0, 2.3, "z");
1407  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.5, 1.0, "y");
1408  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -1.0, 1.0, "x");
1409  tmpCloud = filterVoxel(tmpCloud, 0.01);
1410 // for (int i = 0; i< tmpCloud->points.size(); i++){
1411 // tmpCloud->points[i].r = (i+1)*30;
1412 // tmpCloud->points[i].g = (i+1)*30;
1413 // tmpCloud->points[i].b = (i+1)*30;
1414 // }
1415  PointCloudFeatures tmpFeature = computeFeatures(tmpCloud, "SIFT", "FPFH");
1416  pointClouds.push_back(tmpFeature);
1417  }
1418 
1419  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpAligned (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1420  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr icpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1421  *tmpAligned = *pointClouds.at(0).points;
1422  *icpCloud = *pointClouds.at(0).points;
1423 
1424  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB> icp;
1425  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(0.01);
1426  icp.setMaximumIterations(10000);
1427  //icp.setRANSACOutlierRejectionThreshold(0.1);
1428  icp.setRANSACIterations(0);
1429  icp.setTransformationEpsilon(1e-8 );
1430  icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(0.00001);
1431 
1432  Eigen::Matrix4f prevTrans = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1433 
1434  // TEST

1466  icp.setInputTarget(pointClouds.at(k).points);

1471  *icpCloud = *icpCloud + *outCloud;
1472  std::cout << "Converged! ";
1473  std::cout << k << std::endl;
1474  std::cout << icp.getFinalTransformation() << std::endl;
1475  }

1512 void PointCloudManipulator::alignRobotCell(QStringList fileNames)
1513 {
1514  std::vector<PointCloudFeatures> pointClouds;
1515  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> originalClouds;
1516  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f> cameraPositions;
1517  cameraPositions.push_back(Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity());
1518 
1519 
1520  for(int i = 0; i<fileNames.size(); i++){
1521  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1522  std::cout << fileNames.at(i).toStdString() << std::endl;
1523  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(fileNames.at(i).toUtf8().constData(), *tmpCloud);
1524  originalClouds.push_back(tmpCloud);
1525 
1526 
1527 
1528  // ROBOT CELL 03.03
1529  switch(i){
1530  case 0:
1531  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.8, 0.8, "x");
1532  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.4, 0.3, "y");
1533  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 1.0, 1.7, "z");
1534  break;
1535  case 1:
1536  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.4, 0.5, "x");
1537  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -1.0, 0.1, "y");
1538  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 1.3, 2.6, "z");
1539  break;
1540  case 2:
1541  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.6, 0.3, "x");
1542  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.6, 0.4, "y");
1543  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 1.2, 2.6, "z");
1544  break;
1545  }
1546  tmpCloud = filterVoxel(tmpCloud, 0.01); //0.01
1547  //tmpCloud = filterOutlier(tmpCloud);

1549

1552  //PointCloudFeatures tmpFeature = computeFeatures(tmpCloud, "SIFT", "SHOTCOLOR");

1554  }
1555 
1556  Eigen::Matrix4f prevTrans = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();

1558  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr all_correspondences (new pcl::Correspondences);
1559  all_correspondences = findCorrespondences(pointClouds.at(k).localDescriptorsFPFH, pointClouds.at(k+1).localDescriptorsFPFH);

1561  std::cout << all_correspondences->size() << std::endl;
1562

1565  std::cout << "Rejected using sample consensus, new amount is : ";
1566  std::cout << corrRejectSampleConsensus->size() << std::endl;
1567  visualizeCorrespondences(pointClouds.at(k).points, pointClouds.at(k+1).points, pointClouds.at(k).keyPoints, pointClouds.at(k+1).keyPoints, all_correspondences, corrRejectSampleConsensus);
1568 
1569  Eigen::Matrix4f transSVD = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity ();
1570  transSVD = estimateTransformationSVD(pointClouds.at(k).keyPoints, pointClouds.at(k+1).keyPoints, corrRejectSampleConsensus);
1571  std::cout << transSVD << std::endl;
1572  visualizeTransformation(pointClouds.at(k+1).points, pointClouds.at(k).points, transSVD);
1573  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmp (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1574  Eigen::Matrix4f trans = prevTrans*transSVD.inverse();
1575  pcl::transformPointCloud(*pointClouds.at(k+1).points,*tmp,trans);
1576

1584  *tmpAligned = *pointClouds.at(0).points;
1585  *icpCloud = *pointClouds.at(0).points;

1588  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(0.3);
1589  icp.setMaximumIterations(10000);
1590  icp.setTransformationEpsilon(1e-10);
1591  icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(0.0000001);

1600  initTrans = computeInitialAlignmentFPFH(pointClouds.at(0).keyPoints,pointClouds.at(0).localDescriptorsFPFH,pointClouds.at(k+1).keyPoints, pointClouds.at(k+1).localDescriptorsFPFH,0.08,1.0,1000);

1676 void PointCloudManipulator::refineAlignment(QStringList fileNames)
1677 {
1678  std::vector<PointCloudFeatures> pointClouds;

1684  cameraPositions.push_back(cam0);
1685  Eigen::Matrix4f cam1 = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1686  // This is the matrix from NUC2 to table
1687  cam1 << -0.0369295, -0.99916 , 0.0177825, 0.174928,
1688  -0.592998, 0.00758757 , -0.805168 , 0.016518,
1689  0.804357, -0.0402794 , -0.59278 , 0.945164,
1690  0, 0 , 0 , 1;
1691  cameraPositions.push_back(cam1);
1692  Eigen::Matrix4f cam2 = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1693  // This is the matrix from PC to table
1694  cam2 << -0.999718 , -0.0224201 ,-0.00776418 , 0.604796,
1695  -0.00404688 , 0.483571 , -0.875296 , -0.256756,
1696  0.0233787 , -0.875018 , -0.483525 , 2.14104,
1697  0 , 0 , 0 , 1;
1698  cameraPositions.push_back(cam2);
1699  // This is the matrix from NUC1 to table
1700  Eigen::Matrix4f cam3 = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1701  cam3 << -0.0324064, 0.999472, 0.00236665, -0.236723,
1702  0.701194, 0.0244224, -0.712552, -0.589319,
1703  -0.712233, -0.0214317, -0.701615, 1.82195,
1704  0, 0, 0, 1;
1705

1712  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(fileNames.at(i).toUtf8().constData(), *tmpCloud);
1713

1716  // tmpCloud->points[k].g = 255;
1717  // tmpCloud->points[k].b = 255;
1718  // }

1722

1724  switch(i){
1725  case 0:
1726  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.4, 0.39, "x");
1727  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -1.1, -0.1, "y");
1728  //tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.6, 3.5, "z");
1729  break;
1730  case 1:
1731  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.5, 0.3, "x");
1732  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.7, 0.3, "y");
1733  //tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 0.7, 4.7, "z");
1734  break;
1735  case 2:

1737  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, -0.4, 0.1, "y");
1738  tmpCloud = filterPassThrough(tmpCloud, 0.8, 3.1, "z");
1739  break;

1765  roughClouds.push_back(clouds.at(0));
1766  *initAlignedSave = *cloudsOriginal.at(0);
1767  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f> cameraPositions2;
1768  Eigen::Matrix4f tmp = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1769  cameraPositions2.push_back(tmp);
1770  vis2.addPointCloud(clouds.at(0), "cloud0");
1771  for(int i=1; i<clouds.size(); i++){
1772  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmp (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1773  QString s = "cloud";
1774  s.append(QString::number(i));
1775  Eigen::Matrix4f tmpMat2 = cameraPositions.at(i);
1776  Eigen::Matrix4f tmpMat3 = cameraPositions.at(3);
1777  Eigen::Matrix4f final = tmpMat3*tmpMat2.inverse();
1778  cameraPositions2.push_back(final);
1779  pcl::transformPointCloud(*clouds.at(i),*tmp,final);
1780  roughClouds.push_back(tmp);
1781  vis2.addPointCloud(tmp,s.toStdString());
1782 
1783  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmp2 (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1784  pcl::transformPointCloud(*cloudsOriginal.at(i), *tmp2, final);
1785  *initAlignedSave += *tmp2;
1786  }
1787  pcl::io::savePCDFileBinary("/home/minions/initialAlignedWithObject.pcd", *initAlignedSave);
1788  vis2.spin();
1789 
1790 
1791  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB> icp;
1792  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(0.03); // 0.05
1793  icp.setMaximumIterations(1000);
1794  icp.setTransformationEpsilon(1e-10);
1795  icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(0.0000001);
1796  icp.setInputTarget(roughClouds.at(0));
1797 
1798  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr icpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1799  *icpCloud += *roughClouds.at(0);
1800

1802  icp.setInputSource(roughClouds.at(i));
1803  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr outCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1804  icp.align(*outCloud);
1805  Eigen::Matrix4f transICP = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
1806  if(icp.hasConverged()){
1807  *icpCloud = *icpCloud + *outCloud;
1808  std::cout << "Converged! ";
1809  std::cout << i << std::endl;
1810  //pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpOrig (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1811  transICP = icp.getFinalTransformation();
1812  cameraPositions2[i] = transICP*cameraPositions2[i];
1813  //pcl::transformPointCloud(*tmpk, *tmpOrig, transICP);
1814  //*originalAligned = *originalAligned + *tmpOrig;
1815 
1816  }
1817  }
1818

1830  s.append(QString::number(i));

1860 void PointCloudManipulator::roflKinect(QStringList fileNames)
1861 {
1862  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> clouds;
1863  for(int i = 0; i<fileNames.size(); i++){
1864  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
1865  std::cout << fileNames.at(i).toStdString() << std::endl;
1866  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(fileNames.at(i).toUtf8().constData(), *tmpCloud);
1867  clouds.push_back(tmpCloud);
1868  }
1869 
1870  for (int k = 0; k< clouds.at(0)->points.size(); k++){
1871  clouds.at(0)->points[k].r = 255;
1872  clouds.at(0)->points[k].g = 255;
1873  clouds.at(0)->points[k].b = 255;
1874  }
1875  for (int k = 0; k< clouds.at(1)->points.size(); k++){
1876  clouds.at(1)->points[k].r = 255;
1877  clouds.at(1)->points[k].g = 0;
1878  clouds.at(1)->points[k].b = 0;
1879  }
1880

1884  vis4.spin();
